title: GetUnversionedSDKUnionMetadataLocation fails on .NET Core/Windows
body:
```
MESSAGE:
System.NullReferenceException : Object reference not set to an instance of an object.
+++++++++++++++++++
STACK TRACE:
at Microsoft.Build.UnitTests.ToolLocationHelper_Tests.GetUnversionedSDKUnionMetadataLocation() in D:\j\workspace\_Windows_NT_C---c4a97696\src\Utilities\UnitTests\ToolLocationHelper_Tests.cs:line 158
```

Since this is a Windows SDK-locating function I'm just disabling it for .NET Core MSBuild which doesn't support building for this scenario.
